aka: The Rumble 2012 - Bill O'Reilly vs Jon Stewart

cast.name: 乔恩·斯图尔特 Jon Stewart

this_title: The Rumble in the Air-Conditioned Auditorium: O'Reilly vs. Stewart 2012
trans_title: 冷气礼堂的喧哗: 比尔·奥雷利 vs. 囧司徒
The Rumble 2012 - Bill O'Reilly vs Jon Stewart
introduction: 囧司徒和右派名嘴Bill O'Reilly将于10月6日在首都的乔治华盛顿大学进行90分钟电视辩论。这一总统辩论般的盛事被取名为"冷气礼堂的喧哗"。直播的一半收入将捐给慈善组织。O'Reilly在节目中吐槽道"Stewart and I will debate man-to-man, eye-to-eye. Well, not really. He's a tiny guy."[HuffPost]
chinese_title: 冷气礼堂的喧哗: 比尔·奥雷利 vs. 囧司徒
foreign_title: The Rumble in the Air-Conditioned Auditorium: O'Reilly vs. Stewart 2012
